head.citation-title: WOVEN K-FRAMES IN QUATERNIONIC HILBERT SPACES
head.abstracts: Â© Poincare Publishers.In this paper, we have defined and studied woven K-frames in quaternionic Hilbert spaces. Also, we have studied conditions under which a woven frame(K-frame) form a woven K-frame. Further, we have studied conditions under which a bounded image of woven K-frame forms a woven K-frame. Finally, we prove a perturbation result for woven K-frames in quaternionic Hilbert spaces.
